titles.title: Disavowing the partisan impeachment of William Jefferson Clinton.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committee.subcommittee: Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties
committee.name: House Judiciary

term.name: Government ethics and transparency, public corruption

bill.summary: 11/17/2010--Introduced. Disavows the articles of impeachment filed against President William Jefferson Clinton in the 105th Congress.
